description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the elevation of privilege vulnerability identified by CVE-2024-30091:

1. Download and apply the appropriate update from the Microsoft Update Catalog based on your Windows version. You can find the updates here:
   - [KB5039211](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039211)
   - [KB5039212](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039212)
   - [KB5039213](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039213)
   - [KB5039225](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5039225)

2. Restart your system after installation to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update mitigates a heap-based buffer overflow that could potentially allow an attacker to elevate their privileges.
- Ensure your system matches the requisite build number before applying the updates.

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure you are running a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the installation.
